scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.steps:report: node -e "try { const tracker = require('./tasks/step-tracker.js'); const tasks = tracker.parseStepsFile(); tracker.displayProgressReport(tasks); } catch(e) { console.error('Error loading steps tracker:', e.message); }"
